This will go down as one of my favorite games I have ever played. In this game the single player mode is fare more story driven and takes a lot longer to beat then the og portal, this is a good thing as the ending (no spoilers here) is one of the best in gaming, where I felt so happy yet sad at the same time. There is also a co-op  
mode which is very fun with friends. You can also build and play community maps. I would recommend this game to just about anyone.

alto

Portal 2, in a sense, is the most Nintendo like Valve game out there, and I mean that as a major compliment. They focused on the core puzzle and gameplay mechanics, which allowed them to create intricate puzzles that can be expanded on endlessly due to how the mechanic doesn't rely on theming to make puzzles. Beyond that, the writing is laugh out loud funny and the variety in theming allows the game to stand together with Valve's giants, such as Half Life and Left 4 Dead. I had a blast playing this game, and the potential within it is limitless, so if anyone at Valve is reading this, skip the 3 and go to 4!
